title: Pothole on Main Street
description: There is a large pothole on Main Street near the intersection with 1st Avenue. It has been there for a few weeks and is causing problems for drivers.

title: Street Light Outage
description: The street light on Elm Street between 3rd and 4th Avenue has been out for a week. It's making the area very dark at night.

title: Garbage Collection Issue
description: Garbage has not been collected on Oak Street for the past two scheduled pickups. The bins are overflowing.

title: Broken Water Main
description: A water main burst on Pine Street, causing flooding and water supply issues for nearby homes.

title: Graffiti on Public Buildings
description: Several public buildings on Market Street have been vandalized with graffiti. It needs to be cleaned up.

title: Crime Rate Increasing
description: Now a days the crime rate has been increasing constantly, we have to do something about it

title: Garbage Collection Problem
description: Garbage Collection file is very poor in our area. people are throwing garbage anywhere they want.we should implement strict rules

title: Corruption Problem
description: People are becoming Corrupt.No Work is getting done in time without any bribe

title: Drug Problem
description: people are taking drugs and are becoming drug addicts

title: Drink Problem
description: people are drinking a lot.This needs to stop
